entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
